Functions

 DEFN_SYSCALL0 (block_process, 5)
void sleepProcess ()
 This function allows a program to pass up any remaining processing time it may have been allocated by the scheduler and sleeps it untill the scheduler assigns it more processing time.
void sleepUnprecise (unsigned long ticks)
 This function sleeps untill a number have ticks have passed (Note: Not precise due to the fact that this sleep function may leave the process idled tell past the time given in ticks).

This function allows a program to pass up any remaining processing time it may have been allocated by the scheduler and sleeps it untill the scheduler assigns it more processing time.

void sleepUnprecise ( unsigned long  ticks  ) 

This function sleeps untill a number have ticks have passed (Note: Not precise due to the fact that this sleep function may leave the process idled tell past the time given in ticks).

Parameters:
unsigned long ticks for the amount of time the process wants to sleep
Returns:
None
